skipLink.label.description: Text displayed in the accessible “Skip link” when a keyboard user first tabs into a page.
skipLink.label.markdownDescription: Text displayed in the accessible “Skip link” when a keyboard user first tabs into a page.

search.label.description: Text displayed in the search bar.
search.label.markdownDescription: Text displayed in the search bar.

search.ctrlKey.description: Visible representation of the Control key potentially used in the shortcut key to open the search modal.
search.ctrlKey.markdownDescription: Visible representation of the Control key potentially used in the shortcut key to open the search modal.

search.cancelLabel.description: Text for the “Cancel” button that closes the search modal.
search.cancelLabel.markdownDescription: Text for the “Cancel” button that closes the search modal.

search.devWarning.description: Warning displayed when opening the Search in a dev environment.
search.devWarning.markdownDescription: Warning displayed when opening the Search in a dev environment.

themeSelect.accessibleLabel.description: Accessible label for the theme selection dropdown.
themeSelect.accessibleLabel.markdownDescription: Accessible label for the theme selection dropdown.

themeSelect.dark.description: Name of the dark color theme.
themeSelect.dark.markdownDescription: Name of the dark color theme.

themeSelect.light.description: Name of the light color theme.
themeSelect.light.markdownDescription: Name of the light color theme.

themeSelect.auto.description: Name of the automatic color theme that syncs with system preferences.
themeSelect.auto.markdownDescription: Name of the automatic color theme that syncs with system preferences.

languageSelect.accessibleLabel.description: Accessible label for the language selection dropdown.
languageSelect.accessibleLabel.markdownDescription: Accessible label for the language selection dropdown.

menuButton.accessibleLabel.description: Accessible label for the mobile menu button.
menuButton.accessibleLabel.markdownDescription: Accessible label for the mobile menu button.

sidebarNav.accessibleLabel.description: Accessible label for the main sidebar `<nav>` element to distinguish it fom other `<nav>` landmarks on the page.
sidebarNav.accessibleLabel.markdownDescription: Accessible label for the main sidebar `<nav>` element to distinguish it fom other `<nav>` landmarks on the page.

tableOfContents.onThisPage.description: Title for the table of contents component.
tableOfContents.onThisPage.markdownDescription: Title for the table of contents component.

tableOfContents.overview.description: Label used for the first link in the table of contents, linking to the page title.
tableOfContents.overview.markdownDescription: Label used for the first link in the table of contents, linking to the page title.

i18n.untranslatedContent.description: Notice informing users they are on a page that is not yet translated to their language.
i18n.untranslatedContent.markdownDescription: Notice informing users they are on a page that is not yet translated to their language.

page.editLink.description: Text for the link to edit a page.
page.editLink.markdownDescription: Text for the link to edit a page.

page.lastUpdated.description: Text displayed in front of the last updated date in the page footer.
page.lastUpdated.markdownDescription: Text displayed in front of the last updated date in the page footer.

page.previousLink.description: Label shown on the “previous page” pagination arrow in the page footer.
page.previousLink.markdownDescription: Label shown on the “previous page” pagination arrow in the page footer.

page.nextLink.description: Label shown on the “next page” pagination arrow in the page footer.
page.nextLink.markdownDescription: Label shown on the “next page” pagination arrow in the page footer.

page.draft.description: Development-only notice informing users they are on a page that is a draft which will not be included in production builds.
page.draft.markdownDescription: Development-only notice informing users they are on a page that is a draft which will not be included in production builds.

404.text.description: Text shown on Starlight’s default 404 page
404.text.markdownDescription: Text shown on Starlight’s default 404 page

aside.tip.description: Text shown on the tip aside variant
aside.tip.markdownDescription: Text shown on the tip aside variant

aside.note.description: Text shown on the note aside variant
aside.note.markdownDescription: Text shown on the note aside variant

aside.caution.description: Text shown on the warning aside variant
aside.caution.markdownDescription: Text shown on the warning aside variant

aside.danger.description: Text shown on the danger aside variant
aside.danger.markdownDescription: Text shown on the danger aside variant

fileTree.directory.description: Label for the directory icon in the file tree component.
fileTree.directory.markdownDescription: Label for the directory icon in the file tree component.

builtWithStarlight.label.description: Label for the “Built with Starlight” badge optionally displayed in the site footer.
builtWithStarlight.label.markdownDescription: Label for the “Built with Starlight” badge optionally displayed in the site footer.

pagefind.clear_search.description: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"Clear"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations
pagefind.clear_search.markdownDescription: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"Clear"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations

pagefind.load_more.description: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"Load more results"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations
pagefind.load_more.markdownDescription: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"Load more results"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations

pagefind.search_label.description: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"Search this site"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations
pagefind.search_label.markdownDescription: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"Search this site"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations

pagefind.filters_label.description: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"Filters"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations
pagefind.filters_label.markdownDescription: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"Filters"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations

pagefind.zero_results.description: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"No results for [SEARCH_TERM]"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations
pagefind.zero_results.markdownDescription: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"No results for [SEARCH_TERM]"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations

pagefind.many_results.description: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"[COUNT] results for [SEARCH_TERM]"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations
pagefind.many_results.markdownDescription: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"[COUNT] results for [SEARCH_TERM]"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations

pagefind.one_result.description: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"[COUNT] result for [SEARCH_TERM]"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations
pagefind.one_result.markdownDescription: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"[COUNT] result for [SEARCH_TERM]"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations

pagefind.alt_search.description: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"No results for [SEARCH_TERM]. Showing results for [DIFFERENT_TERM] instead"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations
pagefind.alt_search.markdownDescription: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"No results for [SEARCH_TERM]. Showing results for [DIFFERENT_TERM] instead"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations

pagefind.search_suggestion.markdownDescription: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"No results for [SEARCH_TERM]. Try one of the following searches:"`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations

pagefind.searching.markdownDescription: Pagefind UI translation. English default value: `"Searching for [SEARCH_TERM]..."`. See https://pagefind.app/docs/ui/#translations

expressiveCode.copyButtonCopied.markdownDescription: Expressive Code UI translation. English default value: `"Copied!"`
